summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Municipal Light and Power Plant and System; authorizing an agreement with the United States of America, Department of the Interior acting by and through the Bonneville Power Administrator and with the Washington Public Power Supply System, providing for the purchase by the City of a portion of the electric power output of Nuclear Power Project No. 3 to be constructed by said system and certain other parties and for the exchange of such output with the Administrator in consideration of certain payments, offsets and credits to the City in connection therewith.
